imdb.plot outline: Once the prized exotic pets of Pablo Escobar, hippos have flourished long after their importer's demise. The dangerous and potentially aggressive invaders are moving north up the Magdalena River in Colombia's northern jungles. Will they be persecuted and gunned down like their owners, or will they find a way to survive?
imdb.title: The Cocaine Hippos
plot: Once the prized exotic pets of Pablo Escobar, hippos have flourished long after their importer's demise. The dangerous and potentially aggressive invaders are moving north up the Magdalena River in Colombia's northern jungles. Will they be persecuted and gunned down like their owners, or will they find a way to survive?
